intro.speaker: Mist
intro.line: Are you all right?

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: Nn... Yeah, I’ll be fine.

intro.speaker: Greil
intro.line: So, the sleeping prince awakens!

intro.speaker: Mist
intro.line: Father! can’t believe you! I know those are practice swords, but they’re still heavy! You have no right to be so rough on Ike.

intro.speaker: Greil
intro.line: If this is too much for the boy, he’ll never make it as a mercenary.

intro.speaker: Mist
intro.line: But–

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: You don’t have to worry. I told you, I’m fine.

intro.speaker: Greil
intro.line: Ha! You’d better be. Now grab your sword and get ready!

intro.speaker: Mist
intro.line: What? Don’t tell me you’re going at it again! But–

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: Just until I land a single blow. I’m not giving up until I can get one good hit in on Father.

intro.speaker: Greil
intro.line: I like your resolve, Ike. But it takes more than a strong will to... Hm?

intro.speaker: Boyd
intro.line: Aha! I knew I’d find you here!

intro.speaker: Mist
intro.line: Hi, Boyd. What brings you here?

intro.speaker: Boyd
intro.line: Nothing special. You said you were going to get the boss, but you never came back. I got picked to check up on you.

intro.speaker: Mist
intro.line: Oh! Sorry, I got caught up with Ike and my father.

intro.speaker: Boyd
intro.line: It’s nothing. Besides, I figured I’d get a good laugh watching Ike get worked over by the boss. You...look fine.What happened?

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: Nothing at all. I’m sorry to disappoint you.

intro.speaker: Mist
intro.line: You just missed it. Just a minute ago, he was out cold.

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: Mist!

intro.speaker: Mist
intro.line: Ha ha! Sorry.

intro.speaker: Greil
intro.line: You came at just the right time, Boyd. You can be Ike’s sparring partner.

intro.speaker: Boyd
intro.line: What? Me?

intro.speaker: Greil
intro.line: I’m beginning to think it would be better if he sparred with someone closer to his own skill.

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: ...I understand.

intro.speaker: Ike
intro.line: Thanks for your help, Boyd.

intro.speaker: Boyd
intro.line: Hmph! I don’t know about this to his skill business, but I’m ready!

intro.speaker: Boyd
intro.line: All right. I’m ready for you! Let’s go!

battle.speaker: Mist
battle.line: Not that way, Ike!

battle.speaker: Mist
battle.line: Did you hear me? Not that way!

battle.speaker: Mist
battle.line: Hey! Are you even listening to me?

battle.speaker: Mist
battle.line: You can do it! Boyd’s got nothing! Take him out!

battle.speaker: Boyd
battle.line: Nothing!? I don’t have nothing. I mean, I have– I mean...

battle.speaker: Boyd
battle.line: Hey! What’s the holdup? Let’s get started already.

battle.speaker: Ike
battle.line: I’m coming. Wait right there!

battle.speaker: Boyd
battle.line: Hurry up, will you? Or are you afraid of me?

battle.speaker: Boyd
battle.line: Come on! What are you doing? Are you sure you really want to learn how to fight?

battle.speaker: Boyd
battle.line: Yaaaawn... You know, I’m getting sleepy.

battle.speaker: Boyd
battle.line: Ha ha! I’m not done yet. We’re just getting started.

battle.speaker: Boyd
battle.line: Whoa! Come on! What’s that all about? You’re wasting our time!

battle.speaker: Mist
battle.line: Ah!

battle.speaker: Mist
battle.line: I can’t believe this! If you throw your weapon away,how do you expect to fight? Let me help... Here you go, Ike. Here’s your sword.

battle.speaker: Ike
battle.line: Oh...thanks.

battle.speaker: Mist
battle.line: Try to be a little more careful!

battle.speaker: Boyd
battle.line: That–that wasn’t too bad.

battle.speaker: Mist
battle.line: Boyd, you’re such a loser.

battle.speaker: Boyd
battle.line: Shut your trap!

battle.speaker: Greil
battle.line: Good work, Boyd. That’s enough.

battle.speaker: Boyd
battle.line: Oh, all right!

battle.speaker: Greil
battle.line: Your swordsmanship was decent enough, Ike. Don’t forget how it felt. It won’t always be this easy.

battle.speaker: Ike
battle.line: I know.

battle.speaker: Greil
battle.line: Now that you’re done warming up, it’s time for you to face me again.

battle.speaker: Ike
battle.line: I was hoping you’d say that.

battle.speaker: Greil
battle.line: But first...Mist!

battle.speaker: Mist
battle.line: Right here!

battle.speaker: Mist
battle.line: Here you go, Ike! It’s a vulnerary.

battle.speaker: Mist
battle.line: I’d recommend using it now, before you fight Father. Last time, he knocked you silly.

battle.speaker: Greil
battle.line: Always take time to heal your wounds in a battle–even small ones. By the time you think you’re in trouble, it’s probably too late...Don’t get into that situation.

battle.speaker: Greil
battle.line: Give it your all!

battle.speaker: Greil
battle.line: Get ready, Ike–here I come!

battle.speaker: Greil
battle.line: Come on, boy! You going to give me a challenge this time around?

battle.speaker: Greil
battle.line: Ungh...

end.speaker: Ike
end.line: Father, you were holding back, weren’t you?

end.speaker: Greil
end.line: If you could tell the difference, that means you’re improving.

end.speaker: Boyd
end.line: You know, I wasn’t really giving it my all either...

end.speaker: Ike
end.line: So, Father, does that mean you finally admit that I’m ready?

end.speaker: Greil
end.line: What, to join the company? To take on a job?

end.speaker: Ike
end.line: Yeah. I mean, Boyd’s already out there on the battlefield. I’m ready. I’m tired of being a trainee.

end.speaker: Boyd
end.line: Listen, the difference between you and me is that I’m a professional.

end.speaker: Mist
end.line: A professional who just got beat.

end.speaker: Boyd
end.line: That was just random chance. Random chance.

end.speaker: Greil
end.line: You’ve got a point, Ike... All right. Tomorrow will be your first day as a full-fledged mercenary.

end.speaker: Greil
end.line: But! If I think it’s too much, you’re back to trainee status. You’d better work hard.

end.speaker: Ike
end.line: No problem. Watch– I’ll catch up to everyone in no time.

end.speaker: Greil
end.line: We’ll see. We’d better be heading back to the fort. Everyone’s waiting.
